title: Sharing My Girlfriend: The Perfect Gang Up
description: Thomas and Amanda have been together for years since deciding to start dating in college. Today is the day of a perfect storm they say on the radio, as Thomas and Amanda drive into Norwell, Maine for an engagement party.Thomas believes Norwell to be uneventful and is not looking forward to the reunion of all old friends at the party. But as the storm traps them in the house, an idea takes form in Thomas' head, fueled by an uncanny sexual desire when he sees his girlfriend flirt with the other guys. Amanda is the sole girl left and she is about to experience the hottest night of her life.SEXUALLY EXPLICIT CONTENT!This short story features highly explicit sexual content. All characters within the story are consenting adults, 18 years of age or older. All characters, places and events depicted are entirely fictional and any resemblance to real people, places or events is purely coincidental.Expect elements of the following: M/M/F, M/F/M, 4700+ erotic words
